report.title: Very Nice
report.author: Bob
report.bodytext: In college I never even touched drugs or alcohol. But after 25 years in the work force I just got worn down. /n /n I noticed my consumption of alcohol was getting out of hand so I thought I would try something different. /n /n I was very skeptical especially after a brief time with prescription drugs. /n /n I read about Kratom and just thought I would try it. I ordered some and made some tea out of the concentrated powder. It was nasty tasting but downed it and after a while a tremendous sense of contentment swept over me and I could rest without worrying about something. My dog hopped up to great me and for the first time in about 5 years I was very happy. /n /n I slept and rested about 12 hours!! It is usual for me to only experience maybe 6-7 hours of rest a day. /n /n Very very nice!
